document_data.name: ''Belt of Holy Might''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''belt of holy might''''' was a magical defensive item created by servants of [[deities]] in [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Abilities: These belts granted the same boons as a ''[[belt of priestly might and warding]]'', except the duration of ''[[magic circle against evil]]'' or ''[[Magic circle against good|against good]]'' lasted for 110 minutes and the wearer was given the ability to cast ''[[word of recall]]'' once per day, limited to the wearer and a temple devoted to the deity of which the belt was associated.
document_data.History: Like its cousin items the ''belt of priestly might'' and ''belt of priestly might and warding'', this belt first appeared in use after the [[Time of Troubles]].
document_data.Creation: To create a ''belt of holy might'', the spells ''[[barkskin]]'', ''[[bull's strength]]'', ''magic circle against evil'' or ''against good'', and ''word of recall'' were cast.
